info.name: Crispy Veggie Burger.
info.description: A flavorful patty made with a blend of 7 premium veggies, topped with zesty cocktail sauce, all served between soft, premium buns. Perfectly satisfying and full of flavor.

info.description: A flavorful patty with 7 premium veggies, zesty cocktail sauce, and soft buns, paired with crispy fries (M) and a refreshing Coke (M). A perfectly satisfying and full-flavored meal!
